channel.title: enumeration on Stefan Tobler
channel.description: Recent content in enumeration on Stefan Tobler

item.title: Admirer
item.description: This was one of the first boxes I completed and it was difficult. It took me the longest time to enumerate the directories and finally find what I was looking for. Overall, I learned more about using my resources and double checking where I had thought I already looked.

item.title: Fuzzy
item.description: Fuzzy challenged the user on the basics of fuzzing and taught me how to use wfuzz and other techniques to learn information about my target machine. I suggest anyone who would like to learn about fuzzing take on this challenge.
